attributes.action: Rename Artillery Place in Woolwich to 'Lee Rigby Place'
attributes.additional_details:
The name of the road where Drummer Lee Rigby was murdered is called Artillery Place (London SE18). We ask the Government to rename it Lee Rigby Place in honour of this brave soldier and loving father.

'They shall grow not old, as we that are left grow old:
Age shall not weary them, nor the years condemn.
At the going down of the sun and in the morning,
We will remember them.'
